trans-unit.source: Provides the means to modify the behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control for specific browsers.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法，可以修改特定瀏覽器的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項行為。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter> modifies the markup or behavior of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control for a specific browser or class of browsers, or acts as a filter on some capability.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter>修改的標記或行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制某些功能的特定瀏覽器或瀏覽器，或做為篩選條件的類別。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control are rendered as hyperlinks to accommodate menu navigation.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項轉譯為超連結，以容納功能表瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class maintains state by implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface so that it can respond to and raise specific events during postback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>類別維護狀態，藉由實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>介面，讓它可以回應，並在回傳期間引發特定事件。

trans-unit.source: You can extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter> class to further customize rendering or behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter>類別，以進一步自訂轉譯或行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: 配接器的初始要求會導致.NET Framework 做為搜尋控制項，對應的介面卡的要求瀏覽器的特性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class uses browser definition files to identify the characteristics of the client browser and to map the adapter to the browser type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>類別來識別用戶端瀏覽器的特性，以及對應至瀏覽器類型的配接器會使用瀏覽器定義檔案。

trans-unit.source: For more information about adaptive rendering in ASP.NET, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).
trans-unit.target: 如需在 ASP.NET 中的適應性呈現的詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: 配接器的初始要求會導致.NET Framework 做為搜尋控制項，對應的介面卡的要求瀏覽器的特性。

trans-unit.source: After the adapter is found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控制項配接器發現之後，保留中的對應配接器執行個體的參考其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a strongly typed reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control associated with this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取與這個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 物件相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter" /> 控制項的強型別參考。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 與目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 物件關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.Control%2A> property provides a way to reference the adapter's corresponding control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.Control%2A>屬性可用來參考配接器的對應控制項。

trans-unit.source: When an adapter is associated with a particular control, the .NET Framework will call the life-cycle methods of the adapter in place of or in addition to the life-cycle methods of the control.
trans-unit.target: 配接器與特定控制項相關聯時，.NET Framework 會呼叫取代或是再加控制項存留週期方法的介面卡的生命週期方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.Control%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control of the parent class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.Control%2A>屬性，以擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項的父類別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter>類別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> in the form of a dictionary that contains the adapter's state information.
trans-unit.target: 字典格式的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含配置器的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Loads any control state information that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.SaveAdapterControlState" /> method during a previous request to the page.
trans-unit.target: 載入於先前要求頁面期間由 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.SaveAdapterControlState" /> 方法儲存的任何控制項狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: When an adapter needs to maintain private state information, it can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.LoadAdapterControlState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.SaveAdapterControlState%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 當配接器需要維護私用的狀態資訊時，它可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.LoadAdapterControlState%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.SaveAdapterControlState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In the case of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter> class, where the displayed menu hierarchy is dependent on the previously selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object, `state` provides a dictionary of name/value pairs containing the path of the selected item in the menu's hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 如果是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter>類別，其中顯示的功能表階層是相依於先前所選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>物件`state`提供包含功能表的階層中選取的項目路徑的名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: The `state` parameter is a <xref:System.Web.UI.Pair> object saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.SaveAdapterControlState%2A> during a previous request to the page.
trans-unit.target: `state`參數是<xref:System.Web.UI.Pair>所儲存的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.SaveAdapterControlState%2A>期間頁面之前的要求。

trans-unit.source: If the control is not registered to participate in control state, the adapter must register for control state.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項未登錄至參與控制項狀態，配接器必須註冊控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Adapter control state is maintained in addition to the state for the control, unlike other life-cycle methods.
trans-unit.target: 控制項狀態的不同於其他存留週期方法，除了維護配接器的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> data associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 與此事件關聯的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 資料。

trans-unit.source: Registers the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control as one that requires control state.
trans-unit.target: 將關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項登錄成需要控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnInit%2A> method registers the associated control as one that requires control state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnInit%2A>方法註冊為需要控制項狀態的相關聯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, the .NET Framework calls the Web server control's own <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，.NET Framework 會呼叫 Web 伺服器控制項的自己<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property of the server control is set, the .NET Framework will call the adapter's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method instead of the control's implementation.
trans-unit.target: 不過之後,<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>伺服器控制項的屬性設定時，.NET Framework 會呼叫配接器的實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>方法，而不是控制項的實作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnInit%2A> method to initialize settings in the control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnInit%2A>方法來初始化控制項中的設定。

trans-unit.source: During a postback, this is an important phase for managing interaction with existing view-state data.
trans-unit.target: 期間回傳時，這是用於管理現有的檢視狀態資料互動的重要階段。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。

trans-unit.source: If the adapter overrides the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method, it must call the corresponding method on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果配接器會覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法，它必須呼叫對應的方法基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the control's own <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 否則，控制項自己的<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" />不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> data associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 與此事件關聯的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 資料。

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> method for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 為關聯的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> 控制項處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnPreRender%2A> method calls an internal `OnPreRender` method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>方法會呼叫發生內部`OnPreRender`方法中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>類別。

trans-unit.source: All other pre-rendering functions of the parent classes, such as data binding, applying styles, and event assignments perform as expected.
trans-unit.target: 如預期般執行父類別，例如資料繫結、 套用樣式，以及事件指派的所有其他預先呈現函式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the .NET Framework calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，.NET Framework 呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property of that control is set, the .NET Framework will call the adapter's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnPreRender%2A> method instead of the control's implementation.
trans-unit.target: 不過之後,<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>設定該控制項的屬性時，.NET Framework 會呼叫配接器的實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>方法，而不是控制項的實作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnPreRender%2A> method to finalize any settings in the control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>方法，以完成程序控制項中的任何設定。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to control properties in this phase will be saved to view state, but changes made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A> method are not saved.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制屬性在這個階段中所做的變更會儲存檢視狀態，但在進行變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>方法不會儲存。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。

trans-unit.source: If the adapter overrides the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> method, it must call the corresponding method on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果配接器會覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" />方法，它必須呼叫對應的方法基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the control's own <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> method will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 否則，控制項自己的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" />方法不會引發。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the path of the current node in the menu hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示目前的節點在功能表階層中的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Used to maintain the path of the menu when a postback event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在引發回傳事件時，用來維護功能表路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method is called when the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> event is raised, and is used to maintain the navigation path of the menu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>事件引發，而且用來維護功能表導覽路徑。

trans-unit.source: The `eventArgument` parameter contains a delimited string of menu items that identify the current location in the menu hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: `eventArgument`參數包含分隔的字串，識別功能表階層的目前位置的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The page passes the value of `eventArgument` to the associated control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 頁面值傳遞給`eventArgument`至相關聯控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control also renders the markup element that causes the postback to occur.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項也會轉譯導致回傳發生的標記項目。

trans-unit.source: If the control renders client-side script for postback, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項轉譯回傳的用戶端指令碼時，傳入的引數，從指令碼`eventArgument`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the postback is caused by a simple submit, `eventArgument` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果回傳的起因是簡單的送出，`eventArgument`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The depth of the current node is more than allowed.
trans-unit.target: 目前節點的深度超過允許的深度。

trans-unit.source: This can be caused by an invalid declaration, by a change since the last request, or by a forged (spoofed) request.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是由無效的宣告、上次要求後發生的變更，或偽造的 (詐騙的) 要求所造成。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> instance containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.
trans-unit.target: 包含要建置及呈現裝置特有輸出之方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the browser or device.
trans-unit.target: 加入標記屬性，並將控制項開頭標記 (Tag) 的標記 (Markup) 寫入至發出給瀏覽器或裝置的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the response stream for the client browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>方法加入標記屬性和控制項的開頭標記的標記寫入至發出給用戶端瀏覽器的回應資料流輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> objects will be rendered individually in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A> method and the control will be closed with a call to the subsequent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>會呈現在個別物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A>方法和控制項將會關閉與後續呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> when you want to implement custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>當您想要實作自訂行為。

trans-unit.source: For example, override the method to write multiple tags to the response stream before any control content, such as `<table><tr><td>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，覆寫方法以回應資料流內容，任何控制項之前寫入多個標記，例如`<table><tr><td>`。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> method to assure opening and closing tag consistency in your output.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>方法搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>方法，以確保開頭和結尾標記在輸出中的一致性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.
trans-unit.target: 包含組建及呈現特定裝置輸出方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the associated menu items in the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control to the output stream as a series of hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 以一連串超連結的方式，將關聯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中的關聯功能表項目寫入至輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A> method writes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> objects of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control to the output stream as hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A>方法寫入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>物件相關聯的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>輸出資料流為超連結控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A> method is called from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A> method and is used to perform modifications to the markup code that is rendered to a device browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A>方法從呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>方法，用來執行修改裝置瀏覽器中呈現的標記程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Control properties should be set prior to this phase of the life cycle, and only the actual markup creation for the control done here.
trans-unit.target: 在這裡進行控制項的生命週期和實際標記建立這個階段之前，應該設定控制項屬性。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the control in this stage of the life cycle are not saved to view state.
trans-unit.target: 生命週期的這個階段中的控制項所做的變更不會儲存檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For saving changes made to the control, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: 儲存至控制項所做的變更，覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>事件。

trans-unit.source: The depth of the current item is more than allowed.
trans-unit.target: 目前項目的深度超過允許的深度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The current item is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 目前項目已停用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> instance containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.
trans-unit.target: 包含要建置及呈現裝置特有輸出之方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates final markup and writes the markup for the closing tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the browser or device.
trans-unit.target: 建立最終標記 (Markup)，並將控制項之結尾標記 (Tag) 的標記 (Markup) 寫入至發出給瀏覽器或裝置的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> method writes the markup for the closing tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the response stream for the client browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>方法，結尾標記之控制項的標記寫入至發出給用戶端瀏覽器的回應資料流的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: The attributes, style attributes, and opening tag are rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 屬性、 樣式屬性和開頭標記會轉譯在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> objects are rendered individually in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>呈現在個別物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> when you want to implement custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>當您想要實作自訂行為。

trans-unit.source: For example, override the method to write multiple closing tags to the response stream after any control content, such as ``.
trans-unit.target: 例如，覆寫方法，將寫入多個結尾標記回應資料流之後的任何控制項內容，例如``。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> method in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method to assure opening and closing tag consistency in your output.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>方法搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>方法，以確保開頭和結尾標記在輸出中的一致性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> instance containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.
trans-unit.target: 包含要建置及呈現裝置特有輸出之方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> object containing the properties to write to the response stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> 物件，包含用來寫入至回應資料流的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The position of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> object in the menu hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> 物件在功能表階層中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Renders a single menu item as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 將單一功能表項目呈現為超連結。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderItem%2A> method is called from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A> method to retrieve the styles and spacing attributes from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object and apply them to a newly created hyperlink element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderItem%2A>方法從呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A>方法來擷取的樣式及行距屬性從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>物件，並將它們套用至新建立的超連結項目。

trans-unit.source: The menu hierarchy is traversed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A> method and will call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderItem%2A> method to render each item.
trans-unit.target: 功能表階層中周遊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderContents%2A>方法將呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.RenderItem%2A>方法以呈現每個項目。

trans-unit.source: Each item is rendered as a hyperlink and inherits the properties and styles of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> control.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目呈現為超連結和繼承內容和指定的樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The hyperlink rendered to the page is one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 呈現網頁的超連結可以是下列其中一項：

trans-unit.source: A postback event to open or select the item.
trans-unit.target: 若要開啟或選取的項目有回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: A link to navigate to the target specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> control.
trans-unit.target: 連結，可在指定的目標導覽<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Saves any changes to the adapter private control state that have occurred since the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器之後發生的任何配置器私用控制項狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the adapter's control state information as a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含做為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 的配置器控制狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.SaveAdapterControlState%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control state to maintain the current navigation path of the menu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.SaveAdapterControlState%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制狀態，以維持目前的導覽路徑的功能表。

trans-unit.source: When an adapter needs to maintain private state information, it can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.LoadAdapterControlState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.SaveAdapterControlState%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 當配接器需要維護私用的狀態資訊時，它可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.LoadAdapterControlState%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.SaveAdapterControlState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An adapter might maintain private control state when there are complex features that need to maintain state across requests, separate from the associated control's state.
trans-unit.target: 必須在要求中，與相關聯的控制項的狀態分開維護狀態的複雜功能時，配接器可能會維護私用的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: The adapter needs to register for control state during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnInit%2A> method call in every request.
trans-unit.target: 配接器要登錄期間的控制項狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter.OnInit%2A>方法呼叫中的每個要求。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含傳遞至事件處理常式的選擇性事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter" /> class to process an event raised when a page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 可讓 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter" /> 類別處理頁面回傳至伺服器時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method enables the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter> class to process an event that is raised when a page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法會讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter>處理頁面回傳至伺服器時所引發的事件類別。

trans-unit.source: The page passes `eventArgument` to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 將頁面傳遞`eventArgument`至<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法。
